body.head: Cēṉāvaraiyar
body.p: ed. Ci. Vai. Tāmōtarampiḷḷai 1868, 252–253.
(i-ḷ.) potuveḻuttāṉiyaṉṟaṉavē yaṉṟi, vaṭaveḻuttā ṉiyaṉṟa vaṭacoṟ citaintu variṉum, porutta muṭaiyaṉa, ceyyuḷiṭattu varaiyār e-ṟu.
(e-ṭu.) ‘aramiya viyalakat tiyampum’ eṉavum, ‘tacanāṉ keytiya paṇaimaru ṇōṉṟāḷ’ eṉavum varum.
citaintaṉa variṉumeṉap potuppaṭak kūṟiyavataṉāṉ, āṇai, vaṭṭam, naṭṭam, kaṇṇaṉ eṉap pākatamāyc citaintu varuvaṉavuṅ koḷka.
ic cūttirattāṉum avai tamiḻcco laṉmaiyaṟika. (6)

body.head: Nacciṉārkkiṉiyar
body.p: ed. Irāma. Kōvintacāmipiḷḷai 1997, 375―375.
ituvum atu.
(i-ḷ.)citaintaṉa variṉum - potu eḻuttāṉ iyaṉṟaṉavē aṉṟi vaṭaveḻuttāṉ iyaṉṟa vaṭacol citaintu variṉum, iyaintaṉa varaiyār - poruttamuṭaiyaṉa ceyyuḷiṭattu nīkkār(e-ṟu.)
eṉṟāṟpōlvaṉa cāṉṟōr ceyyuṭkaṇ citaintu vantaṉa.

iṉi, `tantiram, cūttiram, virutti, aruttāpatti, utti' eṉṟāṟpōlvaṉa, nūluḷ citaintu vantaṉa. paṅkayam, iṭapam, vicayam, iruṭikaḷ, mēkam, pantam, mayāṉam, viṭam, tuṅkam, palam, pāram, carccarai, cāti, cēṉai, citti, cātaṉam, ayaṉ, ari, araṉ, āram, arukam, ciṅkam, mōkkam, kāmam, pakkam, cūlam, catam, pōtakam, pōkam , cuttam, calam, mōkam, yōkam, vantaṉai, vēlai, cālai, mālai, uvamai, vaṉitai, puri, mētiṉi, kumari, nati, araṅkam, ilaṅkai, iyakkaṉ, ulōpam, ulōkam, niruttam, kītam, vācciyam, vacciram, aruttam, karumam, karuppam, kāppiyam, paruppatam' eṉṟāṟpōlvaṉa piṉṉuḷḷōr ceyyuṭkaṇ tirintu ēṟkum eḻuttukkaḷāl maruvi vantaṉa.
iṉi, `citaintaṉa variṉum' eṉap potuppaṭak kūṟiya ataṉāl, `āṇai, vaṭṭam, naṭṭam, kaṇṇaṉ' eṉap pātamākac citaintaṉavum koḷka.

body.head: Teyvaccilaiyār
body.p: mēlataṟkoru puṟanaṭai uṇarttutal nutaliṟṟu.
(i-ḷ.) eḻuttoṭu poruntiya collē yaṉṟic citainta coṟkaḷ variṉum, tamiḻvaḻakkiṟkup poruntiṉavai nīkkappaṭā, e-ṟu.
avaiyāvaṉa :-kantam, tacanāṉku (neṭunal. 115), cākaram, cattiram, muttu, pavaḷam eṉa varum. pākatac citaivāki varuvaṉavuṅ koḷka.

ivai nāṉku colliṉum, iyaṟcol peyarc collum, viṉaic collum, iṭaiccollum, uriccollumāki varum. tiricollun, ticaic collum perumpāṉmai peyarum, ciṟu pāṉmai viṉaiyumāki varum. vaṭacol peyarā yallatu vārātu. (6)
